results.name: Mt Ada
results.description: Catalina's only Forbes Travel Guide 4-star hotel, Mt Ada commands the best views in Avalon from its majestic perch high above the bay. The former home of William Wrigley Jr. and his wife Ada, this unique retreat offers six en suite guest rooms, each beautifully appointed to reflect the elegance and charm of a bygone era. Wrigley's former billiards room, which is now a den with bar and fireplace, and the large bay-view living room offer a relaxed ambiance reminiscent of a private residence. Guests enjoy breakfast in the dining room or on the spectacular wrap-around terrace, which is also a great place to spot one of the island's Bald Eagles soaring on the breeze. A host of amenities include a selection of appetizers and wines served every evening, 24/7 Butler's Pantry stocked with beer, wine and assorted snacks, the use of a golf cart to explore the island during your stay, access to Island Spa Catalina's facilities, and much more.

If you're looking for things to do, you can check out Nojoqui Falls Park (0.2 mi), Old Mission Santa Ines (0.2 mi), or Hans Christian Andersen Park (0.5 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
Corque Hotel puts the best of Solvang at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

results.name: Ada Cave Suites
results.description: Ada Cave Suites is the first hotel experience of the Ada Vegas Travel, that has been one of the leading travel agencies, tour and hotel suppliers of Turkey since 1993. Ada Vegas aims to maintain its quality and customer-oriented service mentality in hotel management and crowns its 28 years attentive and dynamic service quality with a hotel in Cappadocia, that is consisting of 17 stone and cave suites. Ada Cave Suites' rooms are created by turning the food warehouses, that were used to store fruits and vegetables in ancient times into luxurious, comfortable suites. Ada Cave Suites' goal is to become the new shining star of Cappadocia with its experienced personnel along with its hospitality centered management method. The hotel offers Turkish baths in the rooms to allow the guests relax after a long day full of adventure and discovery. In addition, there are rooms with jacuzzi and fireplace for the guests, that want to feel the sense of luxury and comfort at its best. Ada Cave Suites offers an unforgettable accommodation experience with the traditional yard architecture along with breakfast balloon that is serenaded by the most magical views of Cappadocia.

results.name: Hotel Indigo Baltimore Downtown, an IHG Hotel
results.description: The cultural heart of Baltimore beats loudly at Hotel Indigo(r) Baltimore Downtown. Our neighborhood is a hub of Charm City history and arts, and our upscale boutique hotel reflects the area's vibrancy with every detail. While there are many things to do in Baltimore, there are also a great number of discoveries to make right here in our hotel. Relax with a book (by hometown author Edgar Allan Poe, perhaps) from our hotel library, and sleep under a literary-themed mural in your guest room. Sip on some of the best craft cocktails in our hotel restaurant, Poets Modern Cocktails & Eats. Sample the honey produced at the hotel by our three honey bee colonies, which can be viewed from our fourth-floor guest rooms. And visit with our canine greeter, Xander, a Blue Brindle Cane Corso who invites you and your own pups to stay at our pet-friendly hotel, enjoy dog treats, and play at the nearby Howard Park Dog Park. Step outside to explore all Downtown Baltimore has to offer, from the Washington Monument of Baltimore to the Walters Art Museum, and enjoy easy access from the hotel to top Baltimore attractions such as the Inner Harbor, Oriole Park at Camden Yards, and the National Aquarium. For business travelers and meeting planners, the Hotel Indigo Baltimore Downtown has more than 4,000 square feet of versatile meeting space, and close proximity to the BWI airport, Baltimore Convention Center and major companies including T. Rowe Price, Under Armour and Transamerica.

results.description:

Steps from major offices like Humana and UPS, our extended-stay hotel is also a quick stroll to restaurants and the Louisville Riverwalk. Visit the Kentucky Science Center, Louisville Slugger Museum & Bat Factory, KFC Yum! Center, Fourth Street Live!, and the Kentucky Center for the Performing Arts - all within a 5-minute walk from our front door.

Make yourself at home in a spacious suite with plush beds, a living area, ergonomic workspace, and a full kitchen. Link devices to free WiFi and kick back on the sofa watching the 46-inch TV. We're happy to provide highchairs, playpens, cribs and DVD players to keep kids comfortable.

All floors have been renovated beautifully, maintaining that heritage charm that it is known for while incorporating modern technology. Centrally located, the property includes the Aura Spa & Salon, General Store Family Restaurant, Mike's Place Pub, the Library Lounge, the Liquor Boutique and Banquet Facilities. results.name: The National Exchange Hotel
results.description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Nevada City, National Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its historic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, The National Exchange Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Nevada City.
Close to some of Nevada City's most popular landmarks, such as Shoe Tree (0.1 mi) and ART OnSite Tribute Trail (1.3 mi), National Hotel is a great destination for tourists.
While in Nevada City, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from National Hotel, including Lefty's Grill (0.1 mi), New Moon Cafe (0.1 mi), and Sopa Thai Cuisine (0.1 mi).
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular historic sites such as Bourn House.
Whether you're traveling for business, pleasure or both, National Hotel is sure to make your visit to Nevada City one worth remembering.

results.name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Berkeley Heights
results.description:
Surrounded by rolling hills and towering trees in northwest New Jersey, you'll find the Embassy Suites by Hilton Berkeley Heights hotel. The only full service, all-suite hotel in the area, our property provides amenities to make your stay feel like a true getaway.

Begin every morning with a free made-to-order breakfast featuring omelets with your choice of fillings, potatoes, bacon, fruit, pastries and more. End a busy day with drinks and snacks at the complimentary Evening Reception* in the beautiful atrium lounge. Daily room service is available, and our Berkeley Heights hotel has a full service Starbucks cafe and unique vintage library. Dine at our signature restaurant and bar, Grain & Crane Bar & Table with chef inspired seasonal offerings and unique drinks.

Each of our two-room suites have a modern farmhouse design with a private bedroom and separate living room with a sofa bed as well as a flat screen TV in each room with cable and movies.

results.name: The Mission Inn Hotel & Spa
results.description: Framed by its breathtaking Spanish Mission-style architecture, The Mission Inn Hotel & Spa welcomes you to a destination where rich history and classic elegance exist in perfect balance with contemporary luxury and comfort. Occupying an entire city block in downtown Riverside, California - just moments from the Riverside Convention Center - this iconic, AAA 4-Diamond hotel has remained faithful to the grand style and ambiance enjoyed by its very first guests in 1876. It is a place where magnificent vistas harbor countless, intimate, hidden treasures. And it's also where the outside world is left behind to set a vivid stage for memories that will last a lifetime.

results.name: Hotel Rock Lititz
results.description: Hotel Rock Lititz provides a vibrant blend of backstage elements from today's leading artists - nestled in a town that prides itself on blending heritage, art, and technology - creating a one-of-a-kind travel experience. This unique lifestyle hotel features 139 remarkable mix of rooms inclusive of superstar penthouse suites designed with elements developed by members of the Rock Lititz Community. Unique features include roadcase sliding bathroom doors, wallpaper featuring 40 years of backstage passes, 55" HD Flat Screen TVs, and elements from live tours! Boasting a modern farm-to-table onsite restaurant, large flexible event space, and social areas with game tables and indoor/outdoor lounges. Our picture-perfect location allows guests to unwind with their favorite drink while watching the sunset over the beautiful Lancaster County farmland. The hotel is 1 mile from downtown Lititz and a short drive to downtown Lancaster, Pa. Hotel Rock Lititz opened in November 2018.

results.name: Gold Miners Inn, Ascend Hotel Collection
results.description: Gold Miners Inn in Grass Valley and close by our sister city, Nevada City offers premium amenities and the comfort of home for traveling families and business travelers alike. We are pet friendly and 100% smoke free. Here, visitors can view the historic Empire Mine State Park and learn the facts behind the California gold rush. Only within a few blocks are wonderful restaurants, shops and local wineries tasting rooms abound. Grass Valley and Nevada City have been designated one of only 14 California Cultural Districts in the state. Nevada City has been named one of the top 3 best small historical towns of America. For business travelers, we have a 7,000 sf Conference Center including our ballroom, meeting rooms and outdoor event patio. During your Grass Valley/Nevada City vacation, you can enjoy our complimentary hot breakfast buffet and enjoy cocktails and snacks at our nightly complimentary evening reception. Voted for 8 years 'Best Hotel' in Nevada County we hope to see you soon.
